recetaMedicaTranslate.errorcedulaEsp: The specialty license should only contain numbers.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errortelefono: The format of the telephone number is incorrect.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errordireccion: The address must only contain letters, numbers, periods, commas, # or /.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errorespecialidad: The specialty of the doctor should only contain letters and numbers.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errornomPrescribe: The name must only contain letters.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errornomPaciente: Only letters are accepted for the name.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errorOrdenFecha: The date can not be after the current one.
recetaMedicaTranslate.errornomAtendido: Only letters are accepted for the name.
recetaMedicaTranslate.msgLista: To save the information must contain at least one record in the list.
recetaMedicaTranslate.msgConfirmBorrar: Do you want to delete the product?
recetaMedicaTranslate.msgConfirmDescartar: Do you want to discard the entered data?
recetaMedicaTranslate.msgSinPlantilla: You need to configure the recipe before continue.
recetaMedicaTranslate.msgExportar: To export the information must contain at least one record in the list.

facturaTranslate.fechasErroneas: Start date must be before the end date
facturaTranslate.deseaBorrarFactura: Do you want to delete the document? (You are reminded that you only have 48 hours to cancel the invoice)
facturaTranslate.deseaTimbrarFactura: Do you want to ring the invoice? (you are reminded that once the invoice is stamped, it can not be modified)
facturaTranslate.timbradoFacturaExitoso: The invoice is successfully stamped, you are reminded that you will only have 48 hours to make the cancellation

CancelacionFactura.ErrorUserPassTim: It is necessary to enter the user, the password and the activation type of the electronic use certificate for electronic billing.
CancelacionFactura.ErrorConfUserPassTim: Currently you do not have the certificate configured to cancel the billing electronically.
CancelacionFactura.ErrorFacTim: The RFC of the issuer and the folio UUID necessary to cancel the invoice were not found.
CancelacionFactura.ErrorDatosFacTim: Currently there is no data necessary to cancel the invoice.
CancelacionFactura.BE-CAN.405: User not authorized to use the service.
